string.name: jeanOverview_txt
string.p: Jean Gunnhildr is a playable Anemo character in Genshin Impact. She is the daughter of Frederica Gunnhildr and Seamus Pegg, and the older sister of Barbara.

string.name: jeanOverview2_txt
string.p: A descendant of the prestigious Gunnhildr Clan, Jean is the Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favoius. She is always busy handling unrest across Mondstadt and of course, tirelessly working to maintain the City of Freedom.

string.name: lisaOverview_txt
string.p: Lisa Minci is a playable Electro character in Genshin Impact. She is received for free in the Prologue Act I: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind during the quest Sparks Amongst the Pages.

string.name: lisaOverview2_txt
string.p: Once a grand mage recognized as the Sumeru Academia\'s most distinguished graduate in 200 years, Lisa has since returned to Mondstadt to become the humble Librarian of the Knights of Favonius.

string.name: eulaOverview_txt
string.p: Eula Lawrence is a playable Cryo character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: eulaOverview2_txt
string.p: A descendant of the infamous and tyrannical Lawrence Clan and niece of Schubert, Eula is the captain of the Reconnaissance Company with the Knights of Favonius.

string.name: ventiOverview_txt
string.p: Venti is a free-spirited, wine-loving bard in Mondstadt and the current mortal vessel of Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. He is also a playable Anemo character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: ventiOverview2_txt
string.p: He first appears during the Archon Quest Prologue: Act I - The Outlander Who Caught the Wind.

string.name: dilucOverview_txt
string.p: Diluc Ragnvindr is a playable Pyro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: dilucOverview2_txt
string.p: Born into the affluent Ragnvindr Clan, Diluc is the current owner of the Dawn Winery and a nobleman of high esteem in Mondstadt society. While a past incident caused him to split ways with the Knights of Favonius, he continues to protect Mondstadt in his own way.

string.name: kleeOverview_txt
string.p: Klee is a playable Pyro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: kleeOverview2_txt
string.p: The daughter of the intrepid - and destructive - adventurer Alice, Klee takes after her mother in many ways, much to the consternation of the Knights of Favonius whom she has been entrusted to.

string.name: monaOverview_txt
string.p: Mona Megistus is a playable Hydro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: monaOverview2_txt
string.p: An astrologist of great skill and equally-great pride, Mona has taken up residence in Mondstadt to avoid incurring the wrath of her master after unwittingly reading the latter\'s diary.

string.name: albedoOverview_txt
string.p: Albedo, also known as the Kreideprinz, is a playable Geo character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: albedoOverview2_txt
string.p: The mysterious Albedo is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius through a recommendation from the adventurer Alice, with Sucrose as his assistant. He holds an infinite desire to learn about the world of Teyvat, carefully studying every object around him.

string.name: amberOverview_txt
string.p: Amber is a playable Pyro character in Genshin Impact. She is received for free in the Prologue Act I: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind during the quest Winds of the Past.

string.name: amberOverview2_txt
string.p: Amber is the only remaining Outrider of the Knights of Favonius. She is always ready to help the citizens of Mondstadt - whether it be something ismple or perhaps a more challenging task.

string.name: kaeyaOverview_txt
string.p: Kaeya Alberich is a playable Cryo character in Genshin Impact. He is received for free in the Prologue, Act I: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind during the quest Crash Course.

string.name: kaeyaOverview2_txt
string.p: Kaeya is a Cavalry Captain in the Knights of Favonius. He is held in high regard by the people of Mondstadt - even with all his eccentricities and secrets.

string.name: barbaraOverview_txt
string.p: Barbara Pegg is a playable Hydro character in Genshin Impact. She is received for free in the Baptism of Song Event for completing the quest A Long Shot during the Prologue Act III: Song of Dragon and Freedom. She is the daughter of Frederica Gunnhildr and Seamus Pegg, and the younger sister of Jean.

string.name: barbaraOverview2_txt
string.p: Barbara is the deaconess of the Church of Favonius and a self-proclaimed "idol" after learning about them from the intrepid adventurer Alice.

string.name: razorOverview_txt
string.p: Razor is a playable Electro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: razorOverview2_txt
string.p: Abandoned as an infant, Razor was taken in by the Wolf of the North, Andrius , and raised by his wolf pack in Wolvendom. After a chance encounter with Varka, the current Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius and the Knight of Boreas, he has slowly started integrating with humans again.

string.name: bennettOverview_txt
string.p: Bennett is a playable Pyro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: bennettOverview2_txt
string.p: An orphan discovered by an elderly adventurer as a baby, Bennett was raised in Mondstadt\'s Adventurers\' Guild. He is the only member of "Benny\'s Adventure Team," as everyone else left the team after experiencing the constant misfortune that follows him.

string.name: noelleOverview_txt
string.p: Noelle is a playable Geo character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: noelleOverview2_txt
string.p: While not yet a knight, she seeks to one day join the Knights of Favonius by first serving as a dutiful maid.

string.name: fischlOverview_txt
string.p: Fischl is a playable Electro character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: fischlOverview2_txt
string.p: Fischl is an investigator for Mondstadt\'s Adventurer\'s Guild, accompanied by the night raven Oz. Fischl claims to hail from a world beyond Teyvat. She is a daring adventurer with seemly outlandish theories that happen to turn out to be true.

string.name: sucroseOverview_txt
string.p: Sucrose is a playable Anemo character in Genshin Impact.

string.name: sucroseOverview2_txt
string.p: An alchemist specializing in bio-alchemy, she also serves as an assistant for Albedo, the head alchemist of the Knights of Favonius.

string.name: dionaOverview_txt
string.p: Diona is a playable Cryo character in Genshin Impact. She is the daughter of Draff, a hunter in Springvale.

string.name: dionaOverview2_txt
string.p: Despite being a bartender at Cat\'s Tail, she actually despises alcohol and wants nothing more than to ruin Mondstadt\'s wine industry - a feat easier said than done when her patrons absolutely love her drinks.
